  2. 04

Background:

Read the paper Working with date and time: http://www.jstatsoft.org/v40/i03/

Write a blog post addressing the questions:

  • What are intervals, durations, periods, and instants?
  • (Why) do we need these distinctions?

Instructions:

Go to https://github.com/Stat585-at-ISU/blog for instructions about how to prepare and submit your blog post.
